snippet: Details of Ms. Mueller’s captivity, including her repeated rape by the leader of the Islamic State, were pieced together by American officials.
abstract: Parents of Kayla Mueller, American aid worker who was abducted by Islamic State, say she was sexual slave of group's leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi.

byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Details of Ms. Mueller’s captivity, including her repeated rape by the leader of the Islamic State, were pieced together by American officials.

headline.main: ISIS Held Kayla Mueller, U.S. Aid Worker, as Sex Slave Before Fatal Airstrike
headline.print_headline: ISIS Held U.S. Aid Worker as Sex Slave Before Death

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
